law.text: The administrator shall pay the insurer all amounts due within ninety (90) days after receiving a loss report. The administrator shall require the loss report to include an itemized statement of the damage, repairs made and the cost of each repair and any other documentation the administrator believes will substantiate the reported loss.
law.history: Created 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 8, effective July 13, 1984.
